title: Delaying Azir for storyline reasons doesn't seem like a good call to me
body:
I can't find the post now, perhaps it was deleted, but someone from Riot confirmed that the only reason they're not unlocking Azir is so they can put out more Shurima storyline first.  I'd just like to let you guys know that I'm pretty much positive most people would just rather be able to use the finished content they already downloaded than to wait a week just to see a new couple minute story video first.  

I don't think anyone needs any extra reasons to dislike the story stuff right now :)

Edit: if you're gonna downvote me for not reading surrender@20, thats cool, but you should then upvote the guy who took time to inform me and any others who don't use that site :)  Thanks 12tales!

replies.body:
Quote by sixtwo - 

>"Hey guys, not sure where the quote comes from, but Azir isn't out yet because he's not done - bug fixes are being checked in around me as I type this. Now carry on!"

Quote by BaconHawk - 

>"I was not clear in stating Azir is not available yet because of "reasons" (he is getting bugfixes). I did not mean to insinuate we are waiting for a lore story part 2... just to give some sort of hope and looking forward. My wording was ****. 

>I'll try to be more clear next time. Let me know if you have any more questions."

Surrender@20 is a pretty useful site.
Thanks, but it'd be nice if they told us that stuff here :)

ANNOUNCEMENT - RiotBaconhawk said something ambiguous!

That shit would get old so fast.

Just do some research before posting.

Also gets old fast: Being condescending to random people on the internet.  

I sent this to Riot through their feedback section of the support page, and they told me to post it here.
I'm not trying to condescend. I just think that googling whatever your question is first is a good way to approach inquiries like this.
I honestly don't give a crap about the story at this point anyway...
